name: Nice and silent appartment
description:
Independent entrance from condominium garden. Apartment located on the second and last floor.
Private parking lot (for free use)
Comfort: super for those who travel by car and/or bike.
In Bologna there is a bike-sharing service with bicycles available 24 hours a day in various areas of the city. You need to download the Mobike app.
Faculty of Engineering and Physics via Terracini: 850 mt.
Old Town: 2 km from Porta Lame
Bus 18 (Oca stop) and 11 A. The night bus is on the 29th
neighborhood_overview:
The green spaces are located along the Navile, reachable on foot from the Andrea Pazienza and Jimmy Endrix park. From there the redevelopment of the area created the new Kolletzeck park near the complex of scientific faculties next to the CNR.

name: Un'isola di cielo tra torri e citt√†
description:
The apartment, bright and cozy, overlooks a square surrounded by magnificent linden trees. The space (110 sqm) has been renovated in modern style and has a spacious living room with terrace. From here, a view of the hill and the dome of Palasport.
In 10 minutes walk you can reach the historic center and the station, and a convenient taxi stand under the house.
A stone's throw away is Via del Pratello, a legendary road closed to traffic that houses the most characteristic taverns and places in Bologna.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in one of the most lively areas of Bologna, where modernity coexists with the historic landscape. The heart of creativity and culture within walking distance: the prestigious Cinema Library, the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art, the slow food market, cinemas, theatres and the famous Via del Pratello will allow you to walk choosing between different cultural and metropolitan itineraries. In addition, excellent non-sightseeing restaurants will complete your stay in the city.

name: Loft in the city center
description:
A bright and quiet loft in the historic city center.
You'll stay in a cozy living area with open kitchen built around the fireplace, you'll have at your disposal a full bathroom with large shower and washing machine , and two rooms.

name: Uno spazio di pace tra i libri
description: The room is very spacious, suitable for lovers of essentiality and white color; to those who want to rest in a comfortable king size bed and be close to the historic center of the city. Large living room with terrace overlooking the hills will welcome you. In case you are interested in the whole apartment, please refer to my other listing "An island of heaven between towers and city" where you will have the whole house of 110 square meters and every modern comfort at your disposal for a relaxing stay.
neighborhood_overview: The district is home to the city's main cultural institutions: the Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art, the Cinema Library, the dams, as well as the cinema and the famous Via del Pratello, one of Bologna's most characteristic pedestrian streets.

name: Private room, private bathroom, private entrance
description:
I am happy to welcome you! My accomodation is a private room with a private bathroom and a private entrance. To get from my house to the city center it takes 20min by foot, 10 by bus. It is not far from the fair (quartiere Fiera).
Self-service breakfast corner in the room, with electric kettle for hot drinks.
No moka, no fridge. In case of need we have a convenient internal parking, at a cost of 5 Euros for each overnight stay.
neighborhood_overview: Our accommodation is located in a convenient location both for those who want to go downtown and for those who want to visit the fairgrounds on the occasion of the fairs.

name: Corte Paradiso | 2Apartments & Courtyard
description:
Corte Paradiso is just in Via Paradiso, 3.
It is a secret corner in the center of Bologna, which we have been sharing with our guests since 2016.

A small courtyard divided into two apartments, joined by a nice private courtyard. Ideal for large families or groups of friends looking to discover Bologna by feeling at home.

We will be happy to recommend restaurants, bike rentals, transfers and food tours...
neighborhood_overview: Via Paradiso is a small and quiet street located between San Felice, elegant shopping street and full of services: pharmacy, bus, pastry shops, and Pratello, famous Bologna street for nightlife: pubs, clubs, but also excellent restaurants.

name: Corner via Parigi
description:
The apartment is located in the historic center, a few steps from Piazza Maggiore, in an elegant and quiet period building, on the first floor with elevator. It has a kitchen, living room, bedroom and bathroom with shower. It is surrounded by restaurants, typical taverns, shops and places of cultural and historical interest.
Ideal for tourist stays, but also for business trips.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is on the corner of Via Galliera and Via Paris about 30 meters from Palazzo Ghisilardi-Fava. In 5 minutes on foot you can reach the most interesting monuments and tourist destinations. Taking Via Manzoni, in fact, right in front of the building door, you reach Via Indipendenza and from there, turning right, in a minute you reach the Neptune Fountain and therefore in Piazza Maggiore. Turn left, once you reach the top of Via Indipendenza, you arrive at the Two Towers of the Garisenda and Asinelli. Near the apartment you can find all the shops useful for a pleasant stay. Between Via Paris and Via Nazario Sauro, in fact, there is a Coop to do grocery, the Queen's Pharmacy and various clothing stores and restaurants, including typical Bolognese taverns and restaurants of other national and international cuisines.

name: Sofia
description:
"Lovely private room in the heart of Bologna!

It features an en-suite bathroom and independent access to ensure maximum privacy and comfort.

Located just a 15-minute walk from the famous Two Towers and a stone's throw away from Via Zamboni, where the main university campuses are situated.

The room boasts a spacious private balcony and the convenience of a bookable private parking, located right behind the condominium complex, in a quiet private street."

name: Stanza privata - Bolognina
description:
The house is very comfortable and cozy and is located in the Bolognina neighborhood 5 minutes by foot from the station and 10 minutes from downtown. It is connected to the center and other areas with a dense public transit network. In the area there are supermarkets, restaurants of all quality and price. All cultural centers of interest such as churches, museums and exhibitions are easily accessible, but also parks and nightclubs.
You can easily park for a fee in the area.

name: Casa Courrier
description: Welcome to the heart of Bologna! Our industrial style apartment, a stone's throw from Piazza Maggiore and the Two Towers, offers you a unique retreat in the historic center. With a walk you can reach the station,the Quadrilatero and the fair. Tastefully furnished and well connected by buses, it is the ideal base for exploring the city. Live authentic Bolognese life in our cozy apartment, located in the very central Via Ugo Bassi. Make your stay unforgettable!
